# stellar-progress



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                             | Type      |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `blurable` | `blurable` |                                                                                                         | `boolean` |
| `editable` | `editable` | Allows the progress bar to be clicked on, to help the user to navigate through the progressing content. | `boolean` |
| `max`      | `max`      | Sets the maximum cap for steps in the progress bar                                                      | `number`  |
| `noease`   | `noease`   | eliminates the easing in the css so you can apply value updates without jitter.                         | `boolean` |
| `slender`  | `slender`  | Renders if this element is slender or not                                                               | `boolean` |
| `value`    | `value`    | Sets the value of the progress bar                                                                      | `number`  |

| ------------- | ----------- |
